exceptions.tactic: unfold contains, chaining_l, star, bicontrolled, monotonic, relation2, wmonotonic in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce star to an evaluable reference.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: unfold contains, chaining_l, star, bicontrolled, monotonic, relation2, wmonotonic in *. intros R x y H. destruct H as [R' [H1 H2]]. exists (chaining_l (star B) x y). split. - exists x. exists y. split; auto. - apply Expansion1. exists x. exists y. split; auto.
